DOC.brief_summary: ZYD1 novel GLP-1 receptor agonist . The ZYD1 exhibit increase stability proteolytic cleavage , especially dipeptidyl peptidase-4 ( DPP-IV ) . ZYD1 potent antidiabetic agent without gastrointestinal side-effects . A first human ( FIH ) Phase I study intend evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics ZYD1 normal healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ZYD1 , Following Subcutaneous Administration Healthy Volunteers
